HDG.ID.content: difference stems from essence of identity [reverse of Derrida?]
HDG.ID.linkedContent: difference stems from essence of identity [reverse of Derrida?]

HDG.ID.content: [method] to have a conversation w/ Hegel must speak about same matter in same way: in the same difference appears, appears all the more pressingly
HDG.ID.linkedContent: [method] to have a conversation w/ Hegel must speak about same matter in same way: in the same difference appears, appears all the more pressingly

HDG.ID.content: for Hegel, matter of thinking (die Sache des Denkens) = absolute Begriff; for us [Heidegger], die Sache des Denkens (preliminarily [vorläufig]): difference as difference [here difference over Being? but also provisional!; cf. HDG.LOG p. 78]
HDG.ID.linkedContent: for Hegel, matter of thinking (die Sache des Denkens) = absolute Begriff; for us [Heidegger], die Sache des Denkens (preliminarily [vorläufig]): difference as difference [here difference over Being? but also provisional!; cf. HDG.LOG p. 78]

HDG.ID.content: [method] step back goes from what is unthought (the difference as such) into what gives us thought (das zu-Denkende) > difference btwn Being & beings, a problem unasked in tradition, but tentatively (vorläufig) [provisional], unavoidably (unvermeidlich), we speak in language of tradition

motif.title: HIEROGLYPH / PASIGRAPHY / LEIBNIZ / CHINESE / UNIVERSAL LANGUAGE

HDG.ID.linkedContent: [method] step back goes from what is unthought (the difference as such) into what gives us thought (das zu-Denkende) > difference btwn Being & beings, a problem unasked in tradition, but tentatively (vorläufig) [provisional], unavoidably (unvermeidlich), we speak in language of tradition

HDG.ID.content: the oblivion (Vergessenheit) of difference: what gives us thought [?]: the veiling (Verhüllung) of difference as such has withdrawn itself from the beginning (sich anfänglich entzogen hat): oblivion belongs to the difference because difference belongs to the oblivion [cf. differance]
HDG.ID.linkedContent: the oblivion (Vergessenheit) of difference: what gives us thought [?]: the veiling (Verhüllung) of difference as such has withdrawn itself from the beginning (sich anfänglich entzogen hat): oblivion belongs to the difference because difference belongs to the oblivion [cf. differance]

HDG.ID.content: still unthought by what logic ontologic & theologic belong together, what origin of this unity is > and the difference is unthought, that onto-theology unifies [?]

motif.name: PREORGINARY SYNTHESIS [Derrida bringing together instead of dividing?]
motif.title: PREORGINARY SYNTHESIS [Derrida bringing together instead of dividing?]

HDG.ID.linkedContent: still unthought by what logic ontologic & theologic belong together, what origin of this unity is > and the difference is unthought, that onto-theology unifies [?]

HDG.ID.content: matter of thinking handed down in West under name “Being” > Heidegger tells us that Being of beings is genitivus objectivus; beings of Being genitivus subjectivus > subject & object stem from Being, so in either case we deal w/ difference [control genitive]
HDG.ID.linkedContent: matter of thinking handed down in West under name “Being” > Heidegger tells us that Being of beings is genitivus objectivus; beings of Being genitivus subjectivus > subject & object stem from Being, so in either case we deal w/ difference [control genitive]

HDG.ID.content: must always think Being in difference w/ beings, & beings in difference w/ Being > difference not a representation added to Being & beings
HDG.ID.linkedContent: must always think Being in difference w/ beings, & beings in difference w/ Being > difference not a representation added to Being & beings

HDG.ID.content: Being & beings are always found to be already there by virtue of & w/in the difference [so close to Derrida, differance, save the “the”] > where does “btwn” come from into which difference is to be inserted? [too representative?]

HDG.ID.content: thing called difference: we encounter it everywhere, encounter it so unquestioningly, we don’t notice encounter itself

motif.name: CALL AND RESPONSE (WELCOME OF THE OTHER, ETHICAL OPENING)
motif.title: CALL AND RESPONSE (WELCOME OF THE OTHER, ETHICAL OPENING)

HDG.ID.linkedContent: thing called difference: we encounter it everywhere, encounter it so unquestioningly, we don’t notice encounter itself

HDG.ID.content: what to make of Being, if it is concurrently Being of…, the genitive of difference? or: what to make of difference if Being & beings appear by virtue of the difference (Differenz) [again, confirms differance?] > [method] to answer, must come face to face w/ difference [not possible in Derrida], accomplish step back, then nearness will achieve its radiance
HDG.ID.linkedContent: what to make of Being, if it is concurrently Being of…, the genitive of difference? or: what to make of difference if Being & beings appear by virtue of the difference (Differenz) [again, confirms differance?] > [method] to answer, must come face to face w/ difference [not possible in Derrida], accomplish step back, then nearness will achieve its radiance

HDG.ID.content: now difference becomes Being of beings [how?] > Being that is beings where “is” speaks transitively, in transition > Being transits over (that) which arrives: arrival (Ankunft) means: “to keep concealed in unconcealedness—to abide present in this keeping—to be a being”

motif.name: UNSCATHED / SAFE / SACRED / GUARD / SECURITY / KEEP
motif.title: UNSCATHED / SAFE / SACRED / GUARD / SECURITY / KEEP

HDG.ID.linkedContent: now difference becomes Being of beings [how?] > Being that is beings where “is” speaks transitively, in transition > Being transits over (that) which arrives: arrival (Ankunft) means: “to keep concealed in unconcealedness—to abide present in this keeping—to be a being”

HDG.ID.content: Being as unconcealing overwhelming (enterbergenden überkommnis), beings in sense of arrival (Ankunft): are present, thus differentiated, by virtue of the Same, the differentiation > “the difference of Being & beings, as the differentiation of overwhelming & arrival, is the perdurance (Austrag) of the 2 in the unconcealing keeping in concealment” > being apart & toward each other of overwhelming/arrival: clearing of what veils & closes itself off

motif.name: UNSCATHED / SAFE / SACRED / GUARD / SECURITY / KEEP

HDG.ID.linkedContent: Being as unconcealing overwhelming (enterbergenden überkommnis), beings in sense of arrival (Ankunft): are present, thus differentiated, by virtue of the Same, the differentiation > “the difference of Being & beings, as the differentiation of overwhelming & arrival, is the perdurance (Austrag) of the 2 in the unconcealing keeping in concealment” > being apart & toward each other of overwhelming/arrival: clearing of what veils & closes itself off

HDG.ID.content: differentiation alone holds apart “btwn” of overwhelming/arrival [ontological difference so close to spacing, but still knows what borders it?]
HDG.ID.linkedContent: differentiation alone holds apart “btwn” of overwhelming/arrival [ontological difference so close to spacing, but still knows what borders it?]

HDG.ID.content: rigorous thinking, one step back: Being thought in terms of the difference [need another step back? to get to Derrida?]
HDG.ID.linkedContent: rigorous thinking, one step back: Being thought in terms of the difference [need another step back? to get to Derrida?]

HDG.ID.content: out of oblivion of difference as such to think difference as perdurance of unconcealing overcoming & self-keeping arrival [why? why would spacing say something about Being’s destiny, its all-pervasiveness] > Being’s possible all-pervasiveness not universal, not a law guaranteeing a dialectical process

HDG.ID.content: how did difference as perdurance (Austrag) remain concealed in the history of metaphysics?
HDG.ID.linkedContent: how did difference as perdurance (Austrag) remain concealed in the history of metaphysics?

HDG.ID.content: re: difference, perdurance as a circling, circling of Being & beings around each other

HDG.ID.linkedContent: re: difference, perdurance as a circling, circling of Being & beings around each other

HDG.ID.content: metaphysics does not heed (achten) difference as difference, only what differs > what differs is Being of being in general, the highest [how does Heidegger escape this?]

HDG.ID.content: origin of the difference can no longer be thought w/in scope of metaphysics [why keep origin? for Derrida differance deconstructs originariness]

HDG.ID.content: the difference constitutes ground plan in structure of essence of metaphysics, perdurance results in & gives Being as generative ground > this ground must be properly accounted for by that for which it accounts, by the causation through original matter—cause as causa sui [Nietzsche]: right name for god of philosophy

HDG.ID.content: [method] step back out of metaphysics into active essence of metaphysics: out of oblivion of difference as such into das Geschick der sich entziehenden Verbergung (destiny of the withdrawing concealment) des Austrags (of perdurance)
HDG.ID.linkedContent: [method] step back out of metaphysics into active essence of metaphysics: out of oblivion of difference as such into das Geschick der sich entziehenden Verbergung (destiny of the withdrawing concealment) des Austrags (of perdurance)

HDG.BC.content: Nietzsche’s “being” as “last breath of a vaporizing reality”: what happens to ontological difference in this disappearance [can’t Nietzsche affirm a more ancient difference, i.e. differance?]?
HDG.BC.linkedContent: Nietzsche’s “being” as “last breath of a vaporizing reality”: what happens to ontological difference in this disappearance [can’t Nietzsche affirm a more ancient difference, i.e. differance?]?

HDG.BC.content: ontological difference completely valid only if each “side” maintains radical/genuine claim to essence out of itself [causa sui?]
HDG.BC.linkedContent: ontological difference completely valid only if each “side” maintains radical/genuine claim to essence out of itself [causa sui?]

HDG.BC.content: [Nietzsche’s point is not the emptiness of grammar] [why grammar doesn’t matter?] w/out noticing it, we’re considering ontological difference again
HDG.BC.linkedContent: [Nietzsche’s point is not the emptiness of grammar] [why grammar doesn’t matter?] w/out noticing it, we’re considering ontological difference again

HDG.BC.content: we move w/in differentiation of being & beings [good summary of ontological difference] > [“is” method] that we must continually say “is”: being wants to be put into a word, one we always mis-hear
HDG.BC.linkedContent: we move w/in differentiation of being & beings [good summary of ontological difference] > [“is” method] that we must continually say “is”: being wants to be put into a word, one we always mis-hear

HDG.BC.content: in thinking, we move in ontological difference > [***] perhaps too much, inappropriate to speak of the differentiation btwn Being/beings in 1st place, difference already objectified w/out being able to specify where it belongs [why is belonging what makes it inappropriate?] > talk of the differentiation: differentiation is origin of all differences [differance, but it would erase origin]
HDG.BC.linkedContent: in thinking, we move in ontological difference > [***] perhaps too much, inappropriate to speak of the differentiation btwn Being/beings in 1st place, difference already objectified w/out being able to specify where it belongs [why is belonging what makes it inappropriate?] > talk of the differentiation: differentiation is origin of all differences [differance, but it would erase origin]

HDG.BC.content: we have our residence in the distinction (Unterscheidung) btwn Being/beings [ontological difference] > ontological difference looks negative [isn’t], OD holds differentia apart (hält Unterscheidenes auseinander) [spacing], an extension & expanse, space of all spaces > at first, know nothing of this distinction, of what it consists remains hidden: in fact > whether code word (Kennwortes) “distinction” characterizes its essence remains undecided/unasked > “the distinction” more essential than all differences/oppositions btwn beings
HDG.BC.linkedContent: we have our residence in the distinction (Unterscheidung) btwn Being/beings [ontological difference] > ontological difference looks negative [isn’t], OD holds differentia apart (hält Unterscheidenes auseinander) [spacing], an extension & expanse, space of all spaces > at first, know nothing of this distinction, of what it consists remains hidden: in fact > whether code word (Kennwortes) “distinction” characterizes its essence remains undecided/unasked > “the distinction” more essential than all differences/oppositions btwn beings

HDG.BC.content: play of Being, singular univocity of unique [plurivocity?] > Being that which opens, unlocks “openness” of there? [Being opens ontological difference?] > Being sets Being/beings apart, places us into this apartness & the free, liberation in belongingness to Being [Schelling on freedom]

motif.name: CALL AND RESPONSE (WELCOME OF THE OTHER, ETHICAL OPENING)
motif.title: CALL AND RESPONSE (WELCOME OF THE OTHER, ETHICAL OPENING)

HDG.BC.linkedContent: play of Being, singular univocity of unique [plurivocity?] > Being that which opens, unlocks “openness” of there? [Being opens ontological difference?] > Being sets Being/beings apart, places us into this apartness & the free, liberation in belongingness to Being [Schelling on freedom]

HDG.BC.content: want to “experience” this: consider meleta to pan so as to stand immediately in ontological difference, where Being announces essential fullness
HDG.BC.linkedContent: want to “experience” this: consider meleta to pan so as to stand immediately in ontological difference, where Being announces essential fullness

HDG.BC.content: beings always have their equal [Being] > Being is incomparable, unique, always the Same, a sameness that doesn’t exclude differences [indifference point] > no various Being, can’t break up into multiple/numerous [dissemination vs. plurivocity]
HDG.BC.linkedContent: beings always have their equal [Being] > Being is incomparable, unique, always the Same, a sameness that doesn’t exclude differences [indifference point] > no various Being, can’t break up into multiple/numerous [dissemination vs. plurivocity]

HDG.BC.content: philosophical critique of contemporary physics [science], reflection can’t limit itself to examination of “law of causality” > predictability a principle of knowledge of beings, so even physics converts ontological law into “epistemological principle” (an error, a fall), “quantum metaphysics” > science helps indicate “being” as most intelligible (hardly noticed attitude at bottom of claim of physics)
HDG.BC.linkedContent: philosophical critique of contemporary physics [science], reflection can’t limit itself to examination of “law of causality” > predictability a principle of knowledge of beings, so even physics converts ontological law into “epistemological principle” (an error, a fall), “quantum metaphysics” > science helps indicate “being” as most intelligible (hardly noticed attitude at bottom of claim of physics)

HDG.BC.content: guidewords not propositions passed around as assertions “about” a “philosophical standpoint”: treated as such they’d miss the essential [Heidegger beyond Heidegger] > this reflection doesn’t have to cling to phrasing of what’s said here > main point: notice something neglected, notice it w/out haste [slow down], don’t seek its utility or purpose; have courage to recognize what holds sway (waltet) in domain of ontological difference [differance?]

motif.title: BEYOND ECONOMY / SURPLUS VALUE / GENERAL ECONOMY

HDG.LA.content: difference for world/thing disclosingly appropriates things into being a world
HDG.LA.linkedContent: difference for world/thing disclosingly appropriates things into being a world

HDG.LA.content: what is so bidden is commanded to arrive from out of the dif-ference into the dif-ference > primal calling, nature of speaking, authentic bidding

HDG.LA.content: dif-ference gathers the 2 out of itself as it calls them into the rift that is the dif-ference itself > dif-ference as peal of silence [?]

HDG.LA.content: carrying out of world/thing in manner of stilling is appropriative taking place of the dif-ference > simple onefold [?] of the difference
HDG.LA.linkedContent: carrying out of world/thing in manner of stilling is appropriative taking place of the dif-ference > simple onefold [?] of the difference

HDG.TB.content: our task: trace Being to its own from Appropriation (w/out regard to relation of Being to beings) [beyond ontological difference? beyond metaphysics?], think Being w/ out regard to metaphysics > but regard for metaphysics still prevails, thus our task is to cease all overcoming [of metaphysics], leave metaphysics to itself

motif.title: BEYOND ECONOMY / SURPLUS VALUE / GENERAL ECONOMY

HDG.BT.content: “in taking over Descartes’ ontological position Kant made an essential omission: he failed to provide an ontology of Dasein”: the meaning of the Being of the ‘sum’

motif.name: PHILOSOPHY AS AN INSTITUTION (ACADEMIA, UNIVERSITY) via KANT
motif.title: PHILOSOPHY AS AN INSTITUTION (ACADEMIA, UNIVERSITY) via KANT

motif.name: PHILOSOPHY AS AN INSTITUTION (UNIVERSITY, POPULAR) via KANT
motif.title: PHILOSOPHY AS AN INSTITUTION (UNIVERSITY, POPULAR) via KANT

HDG.BT.linkedContent: “in taking over Descartes’ ontological position Kant made an essential omission: he failed to provide an ontology of Dasein”: the meaning of the Being of the ‘sum’

HDG.BT.content: question of Being doesn’t achieve its true concreteness until we’ve carried through process of destroying ontological tradition [telos?]
HDG.BT.linkedContent: question of Being doesn’t achieve its true concreteness until we’ve carried through process of destroying ontological tradition [telos?]

HDG.IWM.content: overcoming of metaphysics [Destruction] corresponded to endeavor to first learn to attend to oblivion of Being, to experience this oblivion, absorb this experience into relation of Being to man, preserve (verwahren) it there [ontological difference & Being] > in the need (Not) belonging to oblivion of Being, question: “What is metaphysics?” perhaps most necessary for thought > [Destruction] representational thought relinquished to thinking brought to pass (ereignetes) by Being itself, in thrall to Being (um dem Sein höriges Denken) [MOP, telos]: more thoughtful our thinking becomes, more purely our thinking will stand of its own accord in sole action appropriate to it [attention to Being]
HDG.IWM.linkedContent: overcoming of metaphysics [Destruction] corresponded to endeavor to first learn to attend to oblivion of Being, to experience this oblivion, absorb this experience into relation of Being to man, preserve (verwahren) it there [ontological difference & Being] > in the need (Not) belonging to oblivion of Being, question: “What is metaphysics?” perhaps most necessary for thought > [Destruction] representational thought relinquished to thinking brought to pass (ereignetes) by Being itself, in thrall to Being (um dem Sein höriges Denken) [MOP, telos]: more thoughtful our thinking becomes, more purely our thinking will stand of its own accord in sole action appropriate to it [attention to Being]

HDG.QB.content: [responding to Jünger on whether one doesn’t need certain concepts—only comprehension of an actuality] our concern not only w/ concepts of science but w/ fundamental words like Gestalt, domination (Herrschaft), representation (Repräsentation), power, will, value, security (Sicherheit), presence (Praesenz) (presencing [Anwesen]), nothing > fundamental words (Grundworten) of thinking are an other kind than metaphysical concepts > in latter: that which concepts (Begriffen) grasp (begreifen) same as this very grasping (Begreifen) [strange phrasing on the difference btwn forgetting fundamental words and using them unexamined]

motif.title: BEYOND ECONOMY / SURPLUS VALUE / GENERAL ECONOMY

HDG.QB.linkedContent: [responding to Jünger on whether one doesn’t need certain concepts—only comprehension of an actuality] our concern not only w/ concepts of science but w/ fundamental words like Gestalt, domination (Herrschaft), representation (Repräsentation), power, will, value, security (Sicherheit), presence (Praesenz) (presencing [Anwesen]), nothing > fundamental words (Grundworten) of thinking are an other kind than metaphysical concepts > in latter: that which concepts (Begriffen) grasp (begreifen) same as this very grasping (Begreifen) [strange phrasing on the difference btwn forgetting fundamental words and using them unexamined]

HDG.QB.content: when question “What is…?” concerned w/ discussing (erörtern) the surpassing (Überstieg) of beings by Being, this surpassing immediately calls into question elements distinguished from one another in that distinction (Unterscheidung) [beyond ontological difference], the distinction in which doctrine of metaphysics moves, or from which metaphysics receives basic outline (Grundriss) of its language (essence/existence, what-being/that-being)

HDG.QB.linkedContent: when question “What is…?” concerned w/ discussing (erörtern) the surpassing (Überstieg) of beings by Being, this surpassing immediately calls into question elements distinguished from one another in that distinction (Unterscheidung) [beyond ontological difference], the distinction in which doctrine of metaphysics moves, or from which metaphysics receives basic outline (Grundriss) of its language (essence/existence, what-being/that-being)

HDG.FS.content: Heraclitus’ Fragment 72 names humans and their “departure from being (Abkommen vom Sein)” (cf. Being and Time), designates a fall upon/away/from beings (Verfall oder Ab-fall [an das Seinde]) > this fall belongs to Difference (Unterschied) btwn Being/beings, so that Fall of Man sets aside [obscures] this difference > for Heraclitus, the foreign depart from difference [not as antagonistically (feindlich) disposed toward foreign (Fremden) as Plato]
HDG.FS.linkedContent: Heraclitus’ Fragment 72 names humans and their “departure from being (Abkommen vom Sein)” (cf. Being and Time), designates a fall upon/away/from beings (Verfall oder Ab-fall [an das Seinde]) > this fall belongs to Difference (Unterschied) btwn Being/beings, so that Fall of Man sets aside [obscures] this difference > for Heraclitus, the foreign depart from difference [not as antagonistically (feindlich) disposed toward foreign (Fremden) as Plato]

HDG.FS.content: xynon means same as koinon? > for Heraclitus, xynienai: going together; koinon merely katholon, the universal, i.e. “what belongs equally to all despite differences” [a going together that’s not the universal common] > co-belonging of xynon is differing (verschieden) (to diapheromenon), this alone can bring together (zusammenbringen): no night alone, no day alone, co-belonging of day/night (their very being) [not dialectic?]

motif.name: PREORGINARY SYNTHESIS [Derrida bringing together instead of dividing?]

motif.name: HIEROGLYPH / PASIGRAPHY / LEIBNIZ / CHINESE / UNIVERSAL LANGUAGE
motif.title: HIEROGLYPH / PASIGRAPHY / LEIBNIZ / CHINESE / UNIVERSAL LANGUAGE

HDG.FS.linkedContent: xynon means same as koinon? > for Heraclitus, xynienai: going together; koinon merely katholon, the universal, i.e. “what belongs equally to all despite differences” [a going together that’s not the universal common] > co-belonging of xynon is differing (verschieden) (to diapheromenon), this alone can bring together (zusammenbringen): no night alone, no day alone, co-belonging of day/night (their very being) [not dialectic?]

HDG.FS.content: for Kant, power of conjoining withdraws before the Understanding, unity hasn’t disappeared but remains in background > over-interpreting, Reason as faculty of unity, perceiving of Being, withdraws behind Understanding (for Kant): ontological difference is at stake (im Spiel ist) > understanding can’t grasp/determine absolute synthesis

motif.name: PREORGINARY SYNTHESIS [Derrida bringing together instead of dividing?]
motif.title: PREORGINARY SYNTHESIS [Derrida bringing together instead of dividing?]

HDG.FS.linkedContent: for Kant, power of conjoining withdraws before the Understanding, unity hasn’t disappeared but remains in background > over-interpreting, Reason as faculty of unity, perceiving of Being, withdraws behind Understanding (for Kant): ontological difference is at stake (im Spiel ist) > understanding can’t grasp/determine absolute synthesis

HDG.FS.content: ontological difference as most dangerous matter for thinking: always represents being, w/in horizon of metaphysics, as being
HDG.FS.linkedContent: ontological difference as most dangerous matter for thinking: always represents being, w/in horizon of metaphysics, as being

HDG.FS.content: ontological difference (danger that it represents being as a being): 1) the difference btwn being/beings is ontological 2) difference btwn being/beings carries along ontology, renders it possible as fundamental discipline of metaphysics > tradition moves in 2nd difference of understanding, no metaphysics recognizes difference as difference in dimension it unfolds (entfaltet)
HDG.FS.linkedContent: ontological difference (danger that it represents being as a being): 1) the difference btwn being/beings is ontological 2) difference btwn being/beings carries along ontology, renders it possible as fundamental discipline of metaphysics > tradition moves in 2nd difference of understanding, no metaphysics recognizes difference as difference in dimension it unfolds (entfaltet)

HDG.FS.content: relation btwn ontology & difference of being/beings can’t be taken up by metaphysics [overcoming metaphysics] > can’t think the foundation (Begründung), only its consequence (Folge): horizon in which ontological difference treated can’t appear as explicit them of ontology [ontology & metaphysics are here linked]
HDG.FS.linkedContent: relation btwn ontology & difference of being/beings can’t be taken up by metaphysics [overcoming metaphysics] > can’t think the foundation (Begründung), only its consequence (Folge): horizon in which ontological difference treated can’t appear as explicit them of ontology [ontology & metaphysics are here linked]

HDG.FS.content: difference btwn Descartes/Hegel: Descartes only sets foot on terra firma (feste Land) of “consciousness,” Hegel thoroughly traverses it > Hegel surveys this land, measures it, not mathematically: the measure is metaphysical/total/“absolute” [method is dialectic]
HDG.FS.linkedContent: difference btwn Descartes/Hegel: Descartes only sets foot on terra firma (feste Land) of “consciousness,” Hegel thoroughly traverses it > Hegel surveys this land, measures it, not mathematically: the measure is metaphysical/total/“absolute” [method is dialectic]

HDG.FS.content: Hegel’s “non-conscious (das Bewusstlose)” evokes Freud, but difference is extreme: Freud’s unconscious (das Unbewusste) doesn’t belong “in consciousness,” whereas for Hegel, difference btwn conscious/non-conscious belongs to consciousness, constructed in consciousness as the Absolute (which is both) > for Hegel [?], non-conscious means not yet posited/sublated
HDG.FS.linkedContent: Hegel’s “non-conscious (das Bewusstlose)” evokes Freud, but difference is extreme: Freud’s unconscious (das Unbewusste) doesn’t belong “in consciousness,” whereas for Hegel, difference btwn conscious/non-conscious belongs to consciousness, constructed in consciousness as the Absolute (which is both) > for Hegel [?], non-conscious means not yet posited/sublated

HDG.FS.content: Aristotle asks what’s extant (seiend) in time?—this is a reduction, a temporal predetermination is operative > for Kant, time conceived in horizon of ob-jectivity, that which holds itself steady in constant flow of changing now > Heidegger explains how short-circuiting of meditation on time covred over meaning of being > “thinking must consequently attempt to further a new—non-metaphysical—way of thinking time [overcoming metaphysics], not governed, surreptitiously, by ontological presupposition of beinghood of time, which concentrates only on what presences

HDG.FS.content: being is not a being: the ontological difference > difference not produced by metaphysics, it maintains/subtends metaphysics > said in Kantian manner, ontological difference is condition of possibility for ontology > ontological difference reigns in all philosophy, fundamentally concealed, never thematized [Derrida’s described not declared]

motif.name: SACRIFICE [to define, philosophy of life required]
motif.title: SACRIFICE [to define, philosophy of life required]

HDG.FS.linkedContent: being is not a being: the ontological difference > difference not produced by metaphysics, it maintains/subtends metaphysics > said in Kantian manner, ontological difference is condition of possibility for ontology > ontological difference reigns in all philosophy, fundamentally concealed, never thematized [Derrida’s described not declared]

HDG.FS.content: difference resists attempt to say it as difference [differance], likewise being resits attempt to say it as being > better to write being: nothing [drop the “is”]
HDG.FS.linkedContent: difference resists attempt to say it as difference [differance], likewise being resits attempt to say it as being > better to write being: nothing [drop the “is”]

HDG.FS.content: meaning of hypothesis, thus theory, has changed: “assuming that…” as purely methodological, no ontological significance > Heidegger on exactitude of modern experimentation, yield identical repeating results, obstructs description (Beschreibung), concerns the effect (Wirkung) [cf. p. 54]: theory will change if effect does not follow, thus purely methodological
HDG.FS.linkedContent: meaning of hypothesis, thus theory, has changed: “assuming that…” as purely methodological, no ontological significance > Heidegger on exactitude of modern experimentation, yield identical repeating results, obstructs description (Beschreibung), concerns the effect (Wirkung) [cf. p. 54]: theory will change if effect does not follow, thus purely methodological

HDG.FS.content: for Heidegger, identity of being/nothing thought in departure (im Ausgang) from ontological difference [departure as from or as leaving behind? cf. 58 departure from Being] > [Hegel thinks this identity w/out concern for ontological difference]
HDG.FS.linkedContent: for Heidegger, identity of being/nothing thought in departure (im Ausgang) from ontological difference [departure as from or as leaving behind? cf. 58 departure from Being] > [Hegel thinks this identity w/out concern for ontological difference]

HDG.FS.content: Sein: Nichts: Selbes? > essence of metaphysics: nothing metaphysical [overcoming metaphysics] > Heidegger’s word neither on side of beings, nor simply on that of being: speaks from where horizon of difference (Differenz) becomes visible: ontological difference as condition of possibility (Bedingung der Möglichkeit) for metaphysics [differance] > Heideggerian proposition (Aussage): is difference itself, speaks of difference w/out holding onto it, thus he has abandoned (verlassen) metaphysics
HDG.FS.linkedContent: Sein: Nichts: Selbes? > essence of metaphysics: nothing metaphysical [overcoming metaphysics] > Heidegger’s word neither on side of beings, nor simply on that of being: speaks from where horizon of difference (Differenz) becomes visible: ontological difference as condition of possibility (Bedingung der Möglichkeit) for metaphysics [differance] > Heideggerian proposition (Aussage): is difference itself, speaks of difference w/out holding onto it, thus he has abandoned (verlassen) metaphysics

HDG.FS.content: nothing characterizes being: ontological proposition > when nothing & its negating aren’t understood negatively, being is something entirely other (etwas ganz und gar Anders) than a being > participle “nihilating (nichtend)” as determinate activity of being, durch die allein das Seiende ist > name it an origin if all ontic-causal overtones are excluded [possible?]: Ereignis of Being as condition for arrival (Ankunft) of beings: das Sein lasst das Seinde anwesen [factical life]

motif.title: CALL AND RESPONSE (WELCOME OF THE OTHER, ETHICAL OPENING)

HDG.FS.content: thinking Ereignis w/ concepts of Being, history of Being, won’t be successful, nor w/ assistance of the Greek (something “to go beyond” [Nietzsche on Socrates]) > Mit dem Sein verschwindet auch die ontologische Differenz [w/ Being, ontological difference vanishes: i.e. Ereignis goes beyond both?]: ontological difference (1927-1936) a necessary impasse (Holzweg)

motif.name: BEYOND ECONOMY / SURPLUS VALUE / GENERAL ECONOMY
motif.title: BEYOND ECONOMY / SURPLUS VALUE / GENERAL ECONOMY

HDG.FS.linkedContent: thinking Ereignis w/ concepts of Being, history of Being, won’t be successful, nor w/ assistance of the Greek (something “to go beyond” [Nietzsche on Socrates]) > Mit dem Sein verschwindet auch die ontologische Differenz [w/ Being, ontological difference vanishes: i.e. Ereignis goes beyond both?]: ontological difference (1927-1936) a necessary impasse (Holzweg)

HDG.FS.content: ontological determination of standing reserve not permanence but orderability, persistent standing-at-one’s-disposal (zur-Verfügung-stehen)—for consumption in planning of whole > replaceability (Ersetzbarkeit) essential to way of being today, every being essentially replaceable [cf. Derrida on substitution], Ersetzbarsein > for example: fashion > time becomes current affairs (Aktualität), continual novelty of incessant change [obsession w/ new] [Heidegger wonders whether May ’68 realized all this]

motif.title: PREORGINARY SYNTHESIS [Derrida bringing together instead of dividing?]

HDG.FS.linkedContent: ontological determination of standing reserve not permanence but orderability, persistent standing-at-one’s-disposal (zur-Verfügung-stehen)—for consumption in planning of whole > replaceability (Ersetzbarkeit) essential to way of being today, every being essentially replaceable [cf. Derrida on substitution], Ersetzbarsein > for example: fashion > time becomes current affairs (Aktualität), continual novelty of incessant change [obsession w/ new] [Heidegger wonders whether May ’68 realized all this]

HDG.FS.content: ontological determination of imperative (Zwang): Ge-stell > in Ge-, one hears gathering, unification, bringing together of all modes of positing (Stellens) > positing as a challenging (Herausfordern), nature is held to (Anhaltens zu) something, forced to adopt a certain form, to play a role > if nature is posed (gestellt) to deliver its energy, man is set (gestellt) to encounter/correspond to these produced energies: the greater the challenging of nature, greater challenge man imposes on himself

motif.name: PREORGINARY SYNTHESIS [Derrida bringing together instead of dividing?]
motif.title: PREORGINARY SYNTHESIS [Derrida bringing together instead of dividing?]

HDG.FS.linkedContent: ontological determination of imperative (Zwang): Ge-stell > in Ge-, one hears gathering, unification, bringing together of all modes of positing (Stellens) > positing as a challenging (Herausfordern), nature is held to (Anhaltens zu) something, forced to adopt a certain form, to play a role > if nature is posed (gestellt) to deliver its energy, man is set (gestellt) to encounter/correspond to these produced energies: the greater the challenging of nature, greater challenge man imposes on himself

HDG.FS.content: there is a return to beginning in Being and Time, but it is through destruction, dismantling, disintegration (Auflösung) (which is sometimes awkward [ungeschickt] [?]) of what is destined as being in metaphysics > not yet in Being and Time a genuine knowledge of history of being, hence the awkwardness, naiveté of “ontological destruction” > since then, unavoidable naiveté of novice gave way to a knowing [he arrived, no more destruction?]
HDG.FS.linkedContent: there is a return to beginning in Being and Time, but it is through destruction, dismantling, disintegration (Auflösung) (which is sometimes awkward [ungeschickt] [?]) of what is destined as being in metaphysics > not yet in Being and Time a genuine knowledge of history of being, hence the awkwardness, naiveté of “ontological destruction” > since then, unavoidable naiveté of novice gave way to a knowing [he arrived, no more destruction?]

HDG.CCP.content: relation btwn Gegnet and Gelassenheit, neither ontic nor ontological: only thought as regioning
HDG.CCP.linkedContent: relation btwn Gegnet and Gelassenheit, neither ontic nor ontological: only thought as regioning

HDG.DL.content: the call of two-fold can’t be explained by presence or present beings, nor in terms of their relation > only two-fold itself which unfolds (enfaltet) the clarity, the clearing (Lichtung), in which Anwesende als solches and Anwesen can be discerned (unterscheidbar) for man > no longer say relation to two-fold, not an object of mental representation, but: the sway of usage (das Walten des Brauches), which we never experience (erfahren) directly [!] [arrival?] if we think (vorstellen) two-fold as difference (Unterschied) visible in comparison that tries to hold Anwesende and Anwesen apart from each other

motif.name: CALL AND RESPONSE (WELCOME OF THE OTHER, ETHICAL OPENING)
motif.title: CALL AND RESPONSE (WELCOME OF THE OTHER, ETHICAL OPENING)

HDG.LP.content: turmoil, curse, [2nd blow], carries each kind (Geschlechter) into irreconcilable split, fragmented stamp, so cleft in 2, can’t find its proper cast (rechter Schlag) [differance not primary for Heidegger here] > the duality of proper cast leaves discord behind, leading into gentleness of simple twofoldness (einfältigen Zwiefalt) [Schelling’s indifference point? sexual difference that isn’t the discord of sexual duality], follows the stranger
HDG.LP.linkedContent: turmoil, curse, [2nd blow], carries each kind (Geschlechter) into irreconcilable split, fragmented stamp, so cleft in 2, can’t find its proper cast (rechter Schlag) [differance not primary for Heidegger here] > the duality of proper cast leaves discord behind, leading into gentleness of simple twofoldness (einfältigen Zwiefalt) [Schelling’s indifference point? sexual difference that isn’t the discord of sexual duality], follows the stranger

HDG.LP.content: in Trakl, “the boy’s blue voice retrieves (zurückholt) something forgotten and fore-tells (vorsagt) it” [cf. youth in Evening Conversations] [p. 178 earliness of long since dead promises “springtime of the soul”]> the boy? Elis, the stranger called to go under (Elis different from Trakl, like Zarathustra different from Nietzsche) > Elis goes down into uralte Frühe, older than decomposing Geschlecht, older because more mindful (sinnender), more mindful because more still, more still because self-stilling > boy Elis shelters/stores gentle two-fold of sex [sexual difference not in discord of duality]

motif.name: CALL AND RESPONSE (WELCOME OF THE OTHER, ETHICAL OPENING)
motif.title: CALL AND RESPONSE (WELCOME OF THE OTHER, ETHICAL OPENING)

HDG.LP.linkedContent: in Trakl, “the boy’s blue voice retrieves (zurückholt) something forgotten and fore-tells (vorsagt) it” [cf. youth in Evening Conversations] [p. 178 earliness of long since dead promises “springtime of the soul”]> the boy? Elis, the stranger called to go under (Elis different from Trakl, like Zarathustra different from Nietzsche) > Elis goes down into uralte Frühe, older than decomposing Geschlecht, older because more mindful (sinnender), more mindful because more still, more still because self-stilling > boy Elis shelters/stores gentle two-fold of sex [sexual difference not in discord of duality]

HDG.LP.content: Trakl: “And the unborn tends to its own peace” [cf. the dead bury their dead] > unborn guards (hütet)/watches over (wahrt) the stiller childhood, “for the coming awakening of mankind” > at rest, the early dead (Frühvestorbene) lives [the 2nd kind of “a dead”: the stranger, the departed, the unborn], promises the gentler two-fold of mankind [sexual difference no in discord of duality]

motif.title: UNSCATHED / SAFE / SACRED / GUARD / SECURITY / KEEP

HDG.EC.content: World War only consequence of devastation [ontological history]
HDG.EC.linkedContent: World War only consequence of devastation [ontological history]

HDG.EC.content: your experience of healing now heals me, letting us become those who wait > the far is near in the nearness of what is held in reserve (Aufbehaltenen), the farness (Ferne) of what is dear (Holden) > for those who wait, the difference (Unterschied) btwn near/far opens most purely > those who wait will guard themselves from hastening to know that which heals in itself

HDG.OHF.content: [method: summary of how to hermeneut “today”] today only fully defined in ontological character as a how of facticity (existence) when we make visible “temporality” (existential not category) as fundamental phenomenon of facticity
HDG.OHF.linkedContent: [method: summary of how to hermeneut “today”] today only fully defined in ontological character as a how of facticity (existence) when we make visible “temporality” (existential not category) as fundamental phenomenon of facticity

HDG.OHF.content: as open space of publicness, nothing eludes the talk: averageness (Durchschnittlichkeit), discusses everything w/ insensitivity to difference (Unterschiedsunempfindlichkeit) > Öffentlichkeit as being of “Man (every-one)”: everyone says that, everyone expects that, talk in circulation belongs to no one [Irigaray] > “Man” = “Niemand” > Dasein haunted like a specter by this circulation, a how of factical life that pays tribute to the fateful undoing (Verhängnisses) of facticity

motif.name: CALL AND RESPONSE (WELCOME OF THE OTHER, ETHICAL OPENING)
motif.title: CALL AND RESPONSE (WELCOME OF THE OTHER, ETHICAL OPENING)

motif.title: SACRIFICE [to define, philosophy of life required]

HDG.OHF.content: [method, quasi-destruction: we must kneed out ontological access to facticity from the initial public givens of being-interpreted, from average talk]
HDG.OHF.linkedContent: [method, quasi-destruction: we must kneed out ontological access to facticity from the initial public givens of being-interpreted, from average talk]

HDG.OHF.content: as-what & How of the world’s being-encountered (Begegnens) lie in significance (Bedeutsamkeit), significance not a category of things but the categorial dimension of being-there > being of world & human life both designated by term Dasein > on basis of factical spatiality we can define ontological meaning of being “in” the environs (Umhaften) of world > “being” that encounters world as Weltdasein, characterized by caring, fundamental mode of being, it “is” its world, the very world it has encountered [hermeneutic circle]
